It also includes funding for disaster relief , health care , education , law enforcement and infrastructure projects .

sent1: Israel 's Supreme Court unanimously rejected a bill limiting its review of military commander decisions on prisoner releases during hostage crises , upholding judicial independence and human rights protections .
sent2: Israel’s Supreme Court rejected an attempt by the country’s legislature to limit its power , including on matters of religion and state . The court struck down a law passed last year that would have allowed the Knesset to override decisions by the court with a simple majority vote . " The Basic Law is intended to harm the status and standing of this court , ” Justice Hanan Melcer wrote in the ruling . " It is meant to ‘cut off the branch’ on which it sits . ” He said the court would not be able to fulfill its role as protector of civil rights if it were subjected to such political control . The decision was hailed by religious pluralism advocates , who had feared the legislation could be used to block their efforts to gain equal recognition under Israeli law .

This paper examines the performance of catechisms in a Goan community in Nairobi as a way of understanding how migrants negotiate their belonging within and outside of Kenya through religious practices . Through an ethnographic study of the catechism , I will explore how Goans make sense of their place in Kenyan society through a complex negotiation of religion , ethnicity and nationality . The law cannot justify because it only reveals sin but cannot remove it . Only Christ can do that . When you see your sin , run to Jesus . He is the one who takes away the sins of the world .

sent1: A 1970 s Pacific Northwest bivalve cancer spreads by hiding dormant for decades , then erupting when conditions are right .
sent2: In the 1970 s , researchers in New Zealand were studying a bizarre cancer that was killing off abalone . They discovered that the cancer had spread through seawater and had killed large numbers of other shellfish in the region as well . The cancer has since been found to have infected many types of marine life worldwide , including sea urchins , mussels and lobsters . A new study suggests it 's been around for at least a century or two . ...

sent1: At 80 , Byron Wien wrote * Unexpected Returns * , inspired by life’s surprises . Starting in 1957 , he tracked data by hand , later becoming Morgan Stanley’s chief strategist . He predicted market moves based on investor psychology , not economics , with high accuracy .
sent2: At age 80 , Byron Wien was forced to retire from Blackstone . But he was n't ready for that , so he started a new career in his eighties , becoming an investment advisor with the firm Blackstone Advisory Partners . In this role , he issued a yearly list of " ten surprises , " or predictions of ten unexpected events that could happen during the upcoming year . He did this for seven years .

sent1: A brined turkey saves time and effort , yielding juicy , flavorful results with just water , salt , sugar , and a few days in the fridge .
sent2: In a perfect world , you’d have the time to cook Thanksgiving dinner all in one day . But if you’re like me , you probably have other commitments—work , school , or family—that take up your weekday hours and leave little time for cooking . If this is the case , I recommend cooking your turkey ahead of time , and reheating it on Thursday . It makes life much easier . Here’s how to do it .
